DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator hypothesize long-term administration adequate intradialytic oral nutritional supplementation increase visceral protein concentration somatic protein store malnourish chronic hemodialysis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Complementary Intradialytic Nutritional Supplementation Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . On hemodialysis 6 month 2 . Optimally dialyze biocompatible membrane ( URR > 70 % and/or deliver Kt/V > 1.2 ) 3 . Suboptimal nutritional status identify : Serum albumin less equal 3.90 g/dl one three follow criterion : Protein catabolic rate le 0.95 g/kg/d calculate three point urea kinetic modeling least 2 occasion past 6 month Progressive unintentional weight loss 2.5 % initial ideal body weight past 6 month and/or patient le 90 % standard body weight Biochemical parameter malnutrition define 1 2 follow measurement consecutive two month prior inclusion : Serum transferrin concentration le 225 mg/dl Serum prealbumin concentration le 32 mg/dl 1 . Active autoimmune , inflammatory infectious disease 2 . Documented malignancy within last 12 month 3 . Patients unusual dietary restriction 4 . Lifeexpectancy le 6 month 5 . Inability tolerate nutritional supplement
